title: Thabo Mamojele
text:
Thabo Mamojele (born 29 July 1986) is a South African <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who last played as a flanker or lock with <a href="Currie%20Cup">Currie Cup</a> side the .
Career.
He was born in <a href="Witbank">Witbank</a> and came through the youth ranks of his local team, the until he moved to the rugby academy of the in 2006. He played two games in <a href="2007%20Vodacom%20Cup">2007</a> for their <a href="Vodacom%20Cup">Vodacom Cup</a> side, the , but failed to make the breakthrough to the first team.
He had a short spell at the for the <a href="2008%20Currie%20Cup%20Premier%20Division">2008 Currie Cup Premier Division</a>, before joining the in 2009. He played for them for three seasons and also represented the in the <a href="Varsity%20Cup">Varsity Cup</a> in 2009 and 2010.
In <a href="2012%20Currie%20Cup%20First%20Division">2012</a>, he joined the .
2013 Kings Super Rugby season.
He was named in the wider training squad for the <a href="2013%20Super%20Rugby%20season">2013 Super Rugby season</a>, but was subsequently released to the Vodacom Cup squad. However, he did make his debut for the when he came on as a substitute for their final <a href="Super%20Rugby">Super Rugby</a> match of the regular 2013 Super Rugby season against the .
Golden Lions.
He joined the for the 2014 season, but he was only in <a href="Johannesburg">Johannesburg</a> for a short spell before moving to <a href="France">French</a> side <a href="US%20Montauban">Montauban</a>.
